title: E2S
subtitle: Ecowheelz
description: Our flagship model of electric scooter offers the perfect balance between power and maneuverability, making it the ideal choice for those seeking a powerful yet flexible ride.

title: E2S Lite
subtitle: Ecowheelz
description: Our E2S Lite electronic scooter boasts not only a lightweight design but also one of the most powerful motors available.

title: E2S Cruiser
subtitle: Ecowheelz
description: Featuring a comfortable saddle, this electric scooter offers the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation. Experience the thrill of the ride without sacrificing comfort.

title: E2S BP+
subtitle: Ecowheelz
description: Despite its sleek design, this electric scooter offers one of our best battery times. Its powerful performance is matched by its impressive energy efficiency.

title: Urban helmet
subtitle: Ecowheelz
description: Introducing TurboCharge helmet for electric scooters, the pinnacle of protection and comfort. Crafted with a robust carbon fiber composite shell.

title: Sport helmet
subtitle: Ecowheelz
description: Sport helmet is an aerodynamic and lightweight helmet that is ideal for sports cycling. It has a hard outer shell in carbon fiber composite.
